abstract: A group of Russian businessmen won an injunction in London against the BP-Rosneft joint venture, which they contend violates the terms of their own venture with BP.
snippet: A group of Russian businessmen won an injunction in London against the BP-Rosneft joint venture, which they contend violates the terms of their own venture with BP.
lead_paragraph: A group of wealthy Russian businessmen won a British court order on Tuesday blocking BP‘s proposed joint venture with Russia’s state-run Rosneft to explore for oil in the Arctic and sending the dispute to arbitration.

headline.main: BP Heads to Arbitration Over Rosneft Venture
